data.title: Bartas wins top Lithuanian awards
data.meta_description: Šarūnas Bartas won the best director and best film awards for Eastern Drift at the Lithuanian Film and TV industry Silver Crane Awards held in...
data.text:
The awards ceremony was broadcast by Lithuanian National Television channel (www.lrt.lt).

The nominees were chosen from the 41 films: 5 feature films, 9 short films, 11 documentary films, 4 animation films, 7 TV films and 5 student works.

The nominees and winners of Silver Crane Awards are selected by cinema professionals: professor and member of the European Film Academy Gražina Arlickaitė, film director and member of the European Film Academy Arūnas Matelis, film critics Živilė Pipinytė and Rasa Paukštytė, cinematographer Viktoras Radzevičius, film and TV director Ignas Miškinis, and composer Gintaras Sodeika.

The Golden Crane Award to a distinguished filmmaker for lifetime achievements in Lithuanian film making was presented to director Arūnas Žebriūnas (Gražuolė, 1969, Velnio nuotaka, 1974, Riešutų duona, 1977)

The complete list of winners follows:

Best Feature film: Šarūnas Bartas, Eastern Drift (Eurazijos aborigenas, www.kinema.lt)

Best short film: Dovilė Šarutytė, I Know You (Aš tave žinau)

Best documentary film: Julija Gruodienė and Rimantas Gruodis, The River (Upė)

Best animation film: Darius Jaruševičius and Ina Šilina, Tiulis

Best television film: Saulius Balandis, Naisių vasara (www.naisiuvasara.lt)

Best Director : Šarūnas Bartas

Best script : Emilis Vėlyvis and Jonas Banys, Zero 2 (director Emilis Vėlyvis, www.zero2.lt)

Best Cinematographer: Feliksas Abrukauskas, It Would be Splendid Yet... (Jau puiku, tik dar šiek tiek, director Lina Lužytė), Wings of Goodness (Gerumo sparnai, director Žeraldas Povilaitis)

Best composer : Happyendless, Zero 2

Best actress: Klaudija Koršunova, Eastern Drift

Best actor: Ramūnas Rudokas and Kęstutis Jakštas, Zero 2

Best supporting actress: Dalia Storyk, Farewell (director Tomas Donela)

Best supporting actor: Petras Lisauskas, Jam Jar (director Ramunė Čekuolytė-Che)

Mastership nomination: SKALVIJA Cinema Center (www.skalvija.lt)

Crane Egg: Rimas Sakalauskas Sync (Sinchronizacija, www.sakalauskasrimas.com) )
